subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Mario Gomez needed nine minutes to score a hat trick after coming on as a substitute in a 6-1 win over Wolfsburg that put Bayern Munich into the German Cup final for the 19th time.
snippet: Mario Gomez needed nine minutes to score a hat trick after coming on as a substitute in a 6-1 win over Wolfsburg that put Bayern Munich into the German Cup final for the 19th time.
